rules.description: In Citrix, add fn modifier to tab so it is forwarded
In Citrix, change left_option to Alt key via "⌘⌥ Command (left)-Option"
In Citrix, change right_option to Alt key via "⌘⌥ Command (left)-Option"
In Citrix, change left_command as well via "Send Windows logo key using ⌘ Command (right)"
Use Delete as Move to Trash
